text: Jishii nyieliieshii gu na shii miie, ji pha chiang shii gu ne khung. Phaul, gune Masi Isu ro khliie ro, chiih-è thuh shii gune ai chiang shii phathegpho ro, jimagunde gu ne hì pha blia rekramuii.9: Masi Isu ro khlei ro, chiih-è thuh shii gune ai chiang shii phathegpho; dinneFiriang, chiih-è Masi Isu, thuh shii gune ai chiang shii phathegpho.
